description: This Java class implements a simple OAuth2 client for providers using standard OAuth2 endpoints. It handles building authorization URLs, exchanging authorization codes for tokens, and fetching user info including email addresses.

classes.name: SimpleOAuthProviderClient
classes.description: A class implementing a generic OAuth2 client for standard providers, capable of constructing authorization URLs, exchanging codes for tokens, and retrieving user info.

methods.name: buildAuthorizationUrl
methods.description: Constructs the OAuth2 authorization URL with appropriate query parameters including scopes and state.

methods.name: exchangeCodeForToken
methods.description: Exchanges an authorization code for access and refresh tokens by making a POST request to the token endpoint.

methods.name: fetchUserInfo
methods.description: Retrieves user information using the access token, with special handling for GitHub emails if email is missing.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name identifier of this OAuth provider client.

methods.name: isConfigured
methods.description: Checks if the OAuth provider client has been properly configured with necessary credentials and URIs.
